# Different way to import/setup data

orig_file <- read_file("../data/day13_01_example.txt")

edit_file <- str_replace_all(orig_file, c("Button A:" = "A", "Button B:" = "B", "Prize:" = "P"))

write_file(edit_file, "../data/day13_01_example_a.txt")

mydf <- read.table("../data/day13_01_example_a.txt", header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

mydf2 <- mydf |> 
  mutate(x = as.integer(str_extract(V2, "\\d+")), y = as.integer(str_extract(V3, "\\d+"))) |> 
  rename(rectype=V1) |>
  select(rectype, x, y)

mydf2
